Posts.Content: Oct 26, 2012 04:15PM MaryannC wrote: I had stage 1, er positive bc in 2006 - had bi lat mast with reconstruction.  This week I had an abnormal chest x-ray, then a cat can, then a bone scan and they still cannot confirm rib fracture (5th posterior) or bc mets to the bone.  I did all that I thought I would have to do -now I need a bone biopsy??  I am so anxious - has this happened to anyone else?  I don't remember doing anything in particular that would point to a rib fracture but I often feel discomfort due to the lat dorsi reconstruction. Your feedback is so appreciated!
Posts.Title: Can bone mets be missed with regular CT and bone scans? foreverhopeful GoldenGirls
